data.quote: If the king does not move, then his subjects will not follow.
I never go back on my word. That is my ninja way.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. You can't gain something without sacrificing something else.
The only thing we're allowed to do is to believe that we won't regret the choice we made.
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
If fate is a millstone, then we are the grist that grinds against it.
No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living.
When you die, you’ll be alone.
It’s fine now. Why? Because I am here!
I will take a potato chip... and eat it!
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
